articles.description: Union home minister Amit Shah mentioned that the new laws are focused on the delivery of justice instead of punishment and implementation of these laws would transform our criminal justice system into the most modern and scientific | Latest News India

articles.title: Searching for Signs of Intelligent Life: Technosignatures - Astrobiology - Astrobiology News
articles.description: Our first confirmed proof of life beyond Earth might not involve biology at all.
articles.content: This illustration shows a hypothetical distant planet inhabited by a technological civilization, with city lights visible on the darkened surface. Illustration: NASA/JPL-Caltech/Lizbeth B. De La Torr… [+9112 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: NASA reveals info about 5 asteroids on their way; Check speed, size, and other details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed the orbits of 5 asteroids that will be coming very close to Earth over the next few days. One of them is as big as a stadium! Know their speed, size, distance of approach, and more, as per the space agency.

articles.title: Nokia signs 5G patent license with Honor - Capacity Media
articles.description: Nokia has signed a new patent cross-license agreement with Honor to cover both parties’ fundamental inventions in 5G and other cellular technologies.
articles.content:
It is the fourth major smartphone agreement from the Finnish vendor in the past 12 months.
